short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to read selected text on web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Text-to-Speech Extension for Google Chrome allows you to conveniently listen to selected text on web pages using the browser's built-in text-to-speech capabilities.

Features
Select and Listen: Simply select any text on a web page, click the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar, and the selected text will be read aloud to you.
Easy Accessibility: Transform online content into an audio experience, making it easier to listen to articles, blog posts, news, and more.
Customizable: Adjust the speed and voice settings for the text-to-speech output according to your preferences.
Multiple Languages: Supports a wide range of languages for text-to-speech conversion, allowing you to listen to content in various languages.
Usage
Install the Text-to-Speech Extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Browse any web page in Google Chrome.
Select the desired text by clicking and dragging the cursor.
Click the Text-to-Speech Extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
Sit back and listen as the selected text is read aloud to you.
